VincentBenjamin knows technology and the talent resources needed to make your organization a winning one. Not only do we stay on top of a carefully managed network of A-level technology candidates and consultants, we also stay on top of the trends that shape the technology requirements in today's complex business environment. Trends like cloud computing, mobile enterprise technology, and increased IT security.From programmers to project managers, from project support to full time placements, VincentBenjamin has the technology resources you need to not only fill an opening, but to build your business!

-Ramped a group of inexperienced inside-sales reps up to a consistently top performing team.-Focused efforts on additional training and development, with an emphasis on sales methodology and strategy, reinforced with live coaching and role-play during and after calls.-Successfully fostered a team culture of inclusion, focus, and positivity, responding to continuously changing strategies and expectations.-Utilized 1:1s and team meetings to create individualized, specific action plans based on sales equations, using data from Salesforce, as well as historical key performance indicators.

-Nationwide consulting with public agencies and private companies of all industries, on how to improve human resources and medical benefits administration through innovative SaaS solutions.-Customized personal sales scripts and prospecting strategies, successfully selling to numerous businesses with unique / complex circumstances.-Consistently out-performed peers, while also working towards improving office morale / company culture, and finished each month as a top performing PHX sales rep. March 25, 2016, Jake reported directly to Simon

Working under Simon's leadership was a catalyst to my success at Zenefits. He possessed a rare quality to challenge, but also provide a plan of action to get our team to the next level. He takes the time to listen before speaking, immediately recognizing strengths so he can fill in the gaps on where reps needed help the most. He's incredibly organized and goal oriented and always backs his plan of action with data and opportunities. The end results were always proven. In fact, Simon graduated from Zenefits leaving his team over 100% to goal.  Simon is someone I trust and will be a mentor to me for the rest of my professional career.

summary: Simon Chelebian specializes in placing direct hire, temporary and project professionals in the Information Technology field across all major industries in the Information Technology area. Simon partners closely with IT managers and executives within our client base, and continually maintains a strong and growing network of the most sought after IT talent in the market. I would love the opportunity to help your business grow by providing top tier IT talent! In addition, if you know anyone in your peer group who is interested in hearing about career opportunities within IT, feel free to contact me. Referrals are always welcomed! I can be reached at 602-595-9900 or via email at schelebian@vincentbenjamin.com. Specialties: Recruiting, Sourcing, Interviewing, Sales, Networking, Negotiating, Consulting, Engineers, Programmers, Developer, Software Developer, JAVA/J2EE, Spring, Hibernate, Agile, Scrum, DBA, ERP, .NET, C#, ASP.NET, MVC,WCF,WF, SQL, Cognos, Sharepoint, Business Analysts, Project Managers, SDLC, Business Objects, TIBCO, PHP, CRM, Python, Flex, Jquery, CSS, security, CISSP.
